Title:
First record of bryophilous and related species of Octospora
lineage (Pezizales, Pyronemataceae) in Japan
Abstract:
This is the first recode of cup fungi of Octospora lineage
(Pezizales, Pyronemataceae). We collected 12 specimens from Honshu and
Amami-Oshima Island, Japan. The results of morphological observation and
molecular phylogenetic analysis, these specimens were identified as four
species in four genera of Octospora lineage (Neottiella albocincta,
Octospora ithacaensis, Octosporopsis erinacea and Leucoscypha
leucotricha). Neottiella albocincta, O. ithacaensis and O. erinacea are
bryophilous Pezizales of Octospora lineage. Leucoscypha leucotricha is
non-bryophilous Pezizales of Octospora lineage. These are the first
reports in Japan at the genus level. This study reveals that bryophilous
or non-bryophilous Pezizales of Octospora lineage are also present in
Japan.
